issue.title: [CF 872] Diminishing Returns last 15 seconds
issue.body:
Me again, sorry :D

The timer of the DR icons I tested starts at 18 seconds, but I can use spells in the same DR category again earlier without reduced durartion. It think it should start at 15 seconds (see: http://us.battle.net/wow/en/forum/topic/10195910192).

I'm using TellMeWhen 6.2.6.


> Posted by CurseForge user meribold | Imported from CurseForge issue #872 | Raw

comments.body:
I will add a setting that will allow this to be adjusted in a future build.

The reason that 18 is used is because it can sometimes go longer than 15 seconds, and it is better to be on the safe side than to be telling thousands of people that their hammer of justice will give a 6 second stun when it could just end up blowing the cooldown for no stun at all if the timing is off for whatever reason. 18 seconds is the time specified by DRData-1.0, the library that TMW uses for its DR data.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Done in v7.0.0: http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/files/1520-6-2-6-163-g3661d78/

also reduced the default to 17 seconds.
